short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check your favorite website status instantly.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily check the current status of any website and keep track of your favorite sites. This extension allows you to quickly view website uptime and status with a single click!

This extension allows you to quickly and effortlessly check the status of any website through the Entireweb Status system. Whether you're monitoring your favorite websites, checking the performance of streaming services, or tracking the availability of online platforms, this extension provides real-time uptime data to keep you informed.

With a simple click, you can:

- Instantly view the status of the website you’re currently visiting, including uptime, performance, and any ongoing issues.
- Track your favorite websites by saving them to your favorites list for quick access and regular monitoring.
- Access detailed status reports through Entireweb's dedicated status pages, ensuring you stay up-to-date with the reliability of the websites you care about.
- Monitor popular websites like Netflix, Amazon, and more directly from your browser.

Entireweb’s status system offers you accurate and up-to-date information about website availability, so you can easily detect outages, performance dips, and other issues that may affect your browsing experience.
